data.name: Error_MissingFiles_Heading
data.value: An Error occurred. Files required for ViVeTool GUI Feature Scanner to work properly are missing.

data.name: Error_MissingFiles_Text_ToBeMigrated
data.value: Please check that the following files are present:

data.name: WB_HTML_Introduction
data.value:
Welcome to the ViVeTool GUI Feature Scanner

This Tool is used to download and scan .pdb (Program Debug Database) Files on newer Windows 10/11 Insider Builds to create your own Feature List.

The ViVeTool GUI Feature Scanner is not supposed to be used by the average user. Downloading PDB Files from the Microsoft Symbol Server usually takes an average of 2 Hours depending on your Internet Speed.

This Tool requires:

  • 5~30GB of Disk Space to store the downloaded Debug Symbols into

  • A installed copy of the Debugging Tools for Windows available from the Windows SDK

After making sure that the requirements are met, set the Text Boxes below to their respective values and press on "Continue". Hover over them to for an example.

After that, the application will automatically start to download PDB Files.
data.comment: Please be sure to leave the HTML intact. A HTML Editor/manually writing a html file and making sure it renders in IE is recommended.

data.value:
An Error occurred while checking if the specified Path to symchk.exe is valid.
Please be sure to enter a valid path to symchk.exe.
If you can not find symchk.exe, it is usually located at the Installation Directory of the Windows SDK\10\Debuggers\x64
